title: Enhanced solar-driven photoelectrochemical water splitting using nanoflower Au/CuO/GaN hybrid photoanodes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16846-16858
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01931H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Alhoda Abdelmoneim, M. A. K. Elfayoumi, Mohamed Sh. Abdel-wahab, Abdullah M. Al-Enizi, June Key Lee, Wael Z. Tawfik
This study focuses on the development of a novel Au/CuO/GaN hybrid structure photoelectrode for efficient photoelectrochemical (PEC) water splitting, enabling environmentally friendly H2 production.
